ACT
155
International will
In the presence of witnesses and an authorized person, the testator signs the will or, if he had already signed it, acknowledges and confirms the signature as his own.
If the testator is unable to sign, he shall state the reason to an authorized person, who shall record this in the will. The testator can ask another person to sign the will.
Witnesses and an authorized person in the presence of the testator shall immediately sign the will.
